name: Super 4096
description:
Join the numbers and get the 4096 tile!

How to play:
Swipe with your finger to move numbers between tiles.
When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one, the number is multiplied by 2.

Get to the 4096 tile and reach a higher score!

Choose among different modes: 4x4, 5x5, 6x6.
